details: Enhances irrigation infrastructure through micro-irrigation and water management.
objective: Improve water use efficiency and expand irrigated areas.
benefit: Higher crop productivity and water conservation.

details: Provides soil health cards with nutrient status and fertilizer recommendations.
objective: Promote balanced fertilizer use based on soil testing.
benefit: Enhanced soil fertility and increased crop yields.

details: Financial support to states for agriculture and allied sector projects.
objective: Increase public investment and promote agri-entrepreneurship.
benefit: Improved agricultural growth and farmer income.

details: Crop insurance against natural calamities, pests, and diseases.
objective: Provide affordable and comprehensive risk coverage.
benefit: Financial stability during crop losses.

details: Income support of ₹6,000 per year in three installments.
objective: Supplement financial needs of small and marginal farmers.
benefit: Direct cash transfer to bank accounts.

details: Credit facility for crops, livestock, and other agricultural needs.
objective: Ensure timely and affordable credit access.
benefit: Subsidized short-term loans for farmers.

details: Online platform for trading agricultural commodities.
objective: Facilitate transparent price discovery and market access.
benefit: Better prices and national market connectivity.

details: Promotes organic farming through cluster-based approach.
objective: Encourage sustainable, chemical-free agriculture.
benefit: Healthier produce and improved soil health.

details: Guaranteed prices for notified crops like wheat, rice, pulses.
objective: Ensure remunerative prices for farmers’ produce.
benefit: Price security and income stability.

details: Pension scheme for small and marginal farmers.
objective: Provide ₹3,000 monthly pension after age 60.
benefit: Financial security in old age.

schemeName: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)
details: Support for fruits, vegetables, flowers, and plantation crops.
objective: Enhance production, processing, and marketing of horticulture.
benefit: Higher income from high-value crops.

details: Promotes climate-resilient farming practices.
objective: Enhance productivity while adapting to climate change.
benefit: Sustainable agriculture and resource conservation.

schemeName: National Mission on Oilseeds and Oil Palm (NMEO-OP)
details: Support for oilseed and oil palm cultivation and processing.
objective: Reduce import dependence on edible oils.
benefit: Higher income for oilseed and oil palm farmers.

details: Promotes beekeeping for pollination and honey production.
objective: Enhance crop yields and farmer income through beekeeping.
benefit: Additional income and improved crop productivity.

schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA)
details: Ensures remunerative prices through price support and deficiency payments.
objective: Stabilize farmer income for specific crops.
benefit: Assured income and market price support.

details: Financing for post-harvest infrastructure like warehouses and cold storages.
objective: Strengthen agricultural infrastructure and reduce losses.
benefit: Improved storage and market linkage.

schemeName: Formation and Promotion of Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs)
details: Support for forming and strengthening FPOs.
objective: Enhance collective bargaining and market access for farmers.
benefit: Better prices and access to inputs and markets.

details: Increases production of rice, wheat, pulses, and coarse cereals.
objective: Enhance food grain production and farmer income.
benefit: Higher yields and assured market support.

schemeName: Chief Minister’s Mannuyir Kaathu Mannuyir Kaappom Scheme (CM MK MKS)
details: Promotes chemical-free agriculture and soil health improvement.
objective: Enhance soil fertility through green manure and vermicompost.
benefit: Sustainable farming and improved soil quality.
subsidy: ₹20 crore for green manure seeds (2 lakh acres), ₹6 crore for vermicompost beds

schemeName: Kalaignarin All Village Integrated Agriculture Development Programme
details: Converts fallow lands into cultivable land and supports integrated farming.
objective: Increase crop coverage and farmer income.
benefit: Reclaimed 47,286 acres at ₹786.86 crore for 10,817 villages.
subsidy: Varies by component (e.g., 50% for integrated farming systems)

schemeName: Chief Minister Dry Land Development Mission (CMDDM)
details: Supports dryland farming through water conservation and crop diversification.
objective: Improve productivity in rain-fed areas.
benefit: Enhanced income for dryland farmers.

details: Groups small and marginal farmers into Farmer Interest Groups (FIGs) and Farmer Producer Groups (FPGs).
objective: Promote collective cultivation and market linkages.
benefit: Improved access to credit, inputs, and markets.

details: Provides 100% subsidy for small/marginal farmers and 75% for others for drip/sprinkler systems.
objective: Enhance water use efficiency in irrigation.
benefit: Reduced water usage and higher crop yields.

details: Subsidizes onion cultivation to boost production.
objective: Increase onion yield and farmer income.
benefit: Improved market access for onion farmers.

details: Subsidizes permanent pandal structures for crops like gourds.
objective: Support high-value crop cultivation.
benefit: Increased income from horticultural crops.

details: Incentives for organic cultivation of greens, vegetables, and other crops.
objective: Promote sustainable and chemical-free farming.
benefit: Healthier produce and better soil health.

details: Supports crop cultivation, livestock, and vermicompost units with 50% subsidy.
objective: Increase farmer income through diversified farming.
benefit: Multiple income sources and sustainability.

details: Subsidies for purchasing tractors, harvesters, and other equipment.
objective: Promote mechanization for small and marginal farmers.
benefit: Affordable access to modern farming tools.
subsidy: 50% for SC/ST, small, marginal, and women farmers

details: Provides off-grid solar pumps for irrigation.
objective: Promote renewable energy in agriculture.
benefit: Cost-effective and sustainable irrigation.

details: Subsidizes solar fencing to protect crops from animals.
objective: Reduce crop damage by wildlife.
benefit: Crop protection and increased yield.

details: Distributes quality seeds for paddy, pulses, and oilseeds.
objective: Ensure availability of certified seeds to farmers.
benefit: Improved crop quality and yield.

details: Subsidizes quality seeds, machine planting, and micronutrients for rice.
objective: Increase rice production and farmer income.
benefit: Higher yields and reduced input costs.

details: Converts fallow lands into cultivable land with subsidies.
objective: Increase cultivable area and farmer income.
benefit: Expanded farmland and higher productivity.

details: Promotes cotton cultivation with subsidies for seeds and practices.
objective: Increase cotton production and farmer income.
benefit: Higher yields and market support.

details: Subsidizes cultivation of hybrid vegetables, mango, and flower crops.
objective: Promote high-value horticultural crops.
benefit: Increased income from vegetables and flowers.
subsidy: ₹20,000 per hectare for vegetables, ₹9,840 for mango, ₹16,000-₹60,000 for flowers

schemeName: State Disaster Response Fund (SDRF) - Agricultural Input Subsidy
details: Provides relief for crop losses due to natural disasters.
objective: Support farmers affected by calamities.
benefit: Financial relief for crop damages.

details: Establishes and renovates farmers’ markets (Uzhavar Sandhais).
objective: Provide direct market access for farmers.
benefit: Better prices and reduced middlemen.
